Key Match Events: Bailey Ober surrendered a career-worst nine earned runs in two innings
Atlanta Braves scored 10 runs, leading to a 10-6 loss for the Twins
Max Fried struck out seven and completed five innings despite the delay
Travis d'Arnaud hit a two-run homer in the second inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins gained ground on two of the three teams nearest to them in the American League playoff picture
The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance due to Ober's poor outing
Post-Match Reflections: Bailey Ober was angry after the game and focused on moving on
The Twins' bullpen got worked and had to pitch multiple innings to finish the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: A 106-minute rain delay occurred due to unexpected tornado sirens
Byron Buxton could be nearing the start of a rehab assignment
